This is an example website constructed to demonstrate how to use the [`workflowr` package](https://jdblischak.github.io/workflowr/).

See the [Home tab](index.html) for an overview of the `workflowr` package.
The [Workflow tab](workflow.html) demonstrates a walkthrough of creating
a new analysis file. The [Resources tab](resources.html) provides links to 
additional resources that may be of use.
